Pro Tips for GEO

  • • Keep titles under 60 characters for full visibility
  • • Descriptions should be 150-160 characters
  • • Include target keywords naturally in title and description
  • • Use unique titles and descriptions for each page
  • • OG images should be 1200x630px for best results
  • • Add schema markup for enhanced AI understanding
  • • Include semantic keywords for LLM optimization
